name: Guess This Not That
description:
Do you know the difference between a tangerine and a nectarine? What about between Henry the VI and Henry the VIII? 

Guess This Not That is a fun word based party game. Try to get your team to guess the right word while avoiding the frustratingly similar wrong word. Keep guessing words until time runs out or your team screws up and guesses the wrong word. Think a mix of Heads Up and Taboo.
